quotes.quote: Accept that you're just a product, not a gift
quotes.author: Konrad

quotes.quote: TEAMWORK: A few harmless flakes working together can unleash an avalanche of destruction.
quotes.author: Justin Sewell

quotes.quote: Dream small. It's your only hope for success, really.
quotes.author: Someone no one remembers

quotes.quote: Never let your morals prevent you from doing what is right.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Life is a shipwreck but we must not forget to sing in the lifeboats.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: If you fall, I'll always be there.
quotes.author: The Floor

quotes.quote: Sex is mathematics. Individuality no longer an issue. What does intelligence signify? Define reason. Desire - meaningless. Intellect is not a cure. Justice is dead.
quotes.author: Bret Easton Ellis

quotes.quote: Life's a bitch, and so am I...
quotes.author: Mom
